about.title: Our Story
about.subtitle: Discover the journey that gave birth to FamilySpot

newMom.title: A First-Time Mom
newMom.description: It all started with a first-time mom who, after giving birth to her first child, realized she barely knew her own city. Where to take the baby? Which places were safe and suitable? These simple questions revealed a major problem.

discovery.title: The Problem Intensifies
discovery.description: When it came time to travel, this problem became even more evident. In unfamiliar cities, finding appropriate places for children became a real impossible mission, full of trial and error.

solution.title: FamilySpot is Born
solution.description: It was from this real need that the idea of FamilySpot emerged: a collaborative map where parents share discoveries, rate places, and help other families find safe and suitable spaces for their children.

about.quote: My mission with FamilySpot is to connect families to places that truly welcome and consider children. I want to turn the anxiety and uncertainty of visiting a new place with kids into a calm, safe, and unforgettable experience.
